      Methods in sceneGraph.math that return Quaternion 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Quaternion Quaternion.add​(Quaternion quaternion)
      Add the x,y,z,w components of the passed in quaternion to the ones of this quaternion
      Quaternion Quaternion.conjugate()
      Conjugate the quaternion.
      Quaternion Quaternion.cpy()  
      Quaternion Quaternion.exp​(double alpha)
      Calculates (this quaternion)^alpha where alpha is a real number and stores the result in this quaternion.
      Quaternion Matrix4d.getRotation​(Quaternion rotation)
      Gets the rotation of this matrix.
      Quaternion Matrix4d.getRotation​(Quaternion rotation, boolean normalizeAxes)
      Gets the rotation of this matrix.
      Quaternion Quaternion.idt()
      Sets the quaternion to an identity Quaternion
      Quaternion Quaternion.mul​(double scalar)
      Multiplies the components of this quaternion with the given scalar.
      Quaternion Quaternion.mul​(Quaternion other)
      Multiplies this quaternion with another one in the form of this = this * other
      Quaternion Quaternion.mulLeft​(Quaternion other)
      Multiplies this quaternion with another one in the form of this = other * this
      Quaternion Quaternion.nor()
      Normalizes this quaternion to unit length
      Quaternion Quaternion.set​(double w, double x, double y, double z)
      Sets the components of the quaternion
      Quaternion Quaternion.set​(Quaternion quaternion)
      Sets the quaternion components from the given quaternion.
      Quaternion Quaternion.set​(SGVec_3d axis, double angle)
      Sets the quaternion components from the given axis and angle around that axis.
      Quaternion Quaternion.setEulerAngles​(double yaw, double pitch, double roll)
      Sets the quaternion to the given euler angles in degrees.
      Quaternion Quaternion.setEulerAnglesRad​(double yaw, double pitch, double roll)
      Sets the quaternion to the given euler angles in radians.
      Quaternion Quaternion.setFromAxes​(boolean normalizeAxes, double xx, double xy, double xz, double yx, double yy, double yz, double zx, double zy, double zz)
      Sets the Quaternion from the given x-, y- and z-axis.
      Quaternion Quaternion.setFromAxes​(double xx, double xy, double xz, double yx, double yy, double yz, double zx, double zy, double zz)
      Sets the Quaternion from the given x-, y- and z-axis which have to be orthonormal.
      Quaternion Quaternion.setFromAxis​(double x, double y, double z, double degrees)
      Sets the quaternion components from the given axis and angle around that axis.
      Quaternion Quaternion.setFromAxis​(SGVec_3d axis, double degrees)
      Sets the quaternion components from the given axis and angle around that axis.
      Quaternion Quaternion.setFromAxisRad​(double x, double y, double z, double radians)
      Sets the quaternion components from the given axis and angle around that axis.
      Quaternion Quaternion.setFromAxisRad​(SGVec_3d axis, double radians)
      Sets the quaternion components from the given axis and angle around that axis.
      Quaternion Quaternion.setFromCross​(double x1, double y1, double z1, double x2, double y2, double z2)
      Set this quaternion to the rotation between two vectors.
      Quaternion Quaternion.setFromCross​(SGVec_3d v1, SGVec_3d v2)
      Set this quaternion to the rotation between two vectors.
      Quaternion Quaternion.setFromMatrix​(boolean normalizeAxes, double[] val)
      Sets the Quaternion from the given matrix, optionally removing any scaling.
      Quaternion Quaternion.setFromMatrix​(boolean normalizeAxes, Matrix3d matrix)
      Sets the Quaternion from the given matrix, optionally removing any scaling.
      Quaternion Quaternion.setFromMatrix​(boolean normalizeAxes, Matrix4d matrix)
      Sets the Quaternion from the given matrix, optionally removing any scaling.
      Quaternion Quaternion.setFromMatrix​(Matrix3d matrix)
      Sets the Quaternion from the given rotation matrix, which must not contain scaling.
      Quaternion Quaternion.setFromMatrix​(Matrix4d matrix)
      Sets the Quaternion from the given rotation matrix, which must not contain scaling.
      Quaternion Quaternion.slerp​(Quaternion[] q)
      Spherical linearly interpolates multiple quaternions and stores the result in this Quaternion.
      Quaternion Quaternion.slerp​(Quaternion[] q, double[] w)
      Spherical linearly interpolates multiple quaternions by the given weights and stores the result in this Quaternion.
      Quaternion Quaternion.slerp​(Quaternion end, double alpha)
      Spherical linear interpolation between this quaternion and the other quaternion, based on the alpha value in the range [0,1].

      Quaternion Quaternion.mulLeft​(Quaternion other)
      Multiplies this quaternion with another one in the form of this = other * this
      Matrix4d Matrix4d.rotate​(Quaternion rotation)
      Postmultiplies this matrix with a (counter-clockwise) rotation matrix.
      Matrix4d Matrix4d.set​(Quaternion quaternion)
      Sets the matrix to a rotation matrix representing the quaternion.
      Matrix4d Matrix4d.set​(SGVec_3d position, Quaternion orientation)
      Set this matrix to the specified translation and rotation.
      Matrix4d Matrix4d.set​(SGVec_3d position, Quaternion orientation, SGVec_3d scale)
      Set this matrix to the specified translation, rotation and scale.
      Quaternion Quaternion.set​(Quaternion quaternion)
      Sets the quaternion components from the given quaternion.
      Quaternion Quaternion.slerp​(Quaternion[] q)
      Spherical linearly interpolates multiple quaternions and stores the result in this Quaternion.
      Quaternion Quaternion.slerp​(Quaternion[] q, double[] w)
      Spherical linearly interpolates multiple quaternions by the given weights and stores the result in this Quaternion.
      Quaternion Quaternion.slerp​(Quaternion end, double alpha)
      Spherical linear interpolation between this quaternion and the other quaternion, based on the alpha value in the range [0,1].
      Constructors in sceneGraph.math with parameters of type Quaternion 
      Constructor Description
      Matrix4d​(Quaternion quaternion)
      Constructs a rotation matrix from the given Quaternion.
      Matrix4d​(SGVec_3d position, Quaternion rotation, SGVec_3d scale)
      Construct a matrix from the given translation, rotation and scale.
      Quaternion​(Quaternion quaternion)
      Constructor, sets the quaternion components from the given quaternion.
